sourcesContent: /* eslint-disable no-unused-vars */ /* eslint-disable react/jsx-no-undef */ import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Dialog, Grid, DialogTitle, DialogContent, DialogActions, Button, Box, Typography, Stepper, Step, StepLabel, StepContent, Card, CardContent, List, ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemText, Chip, Divider, } from '@mui/material'; import { School, PlayArrow, CheckCircle, People, Assessment, TrendingUp, Warning, NavigateNext, NavigateBefore, Close, } from '@mui/icons-material'; const WelcomeTutorial = ({ open, onClose }) => { const [activeStep, setActiveStep] = useState(0); const steps = [ { label: 'Welcome to Employee Performance System', icon: , content: ( This AI-powered system helps you manage employees, predict performance, and prevent attrition. üéØ Key Features ), }, { label: 'Step 1: Add Employees', icon: , content: ( Start by adding employees to the system. How to Add an Employee: üí° Tip: A user account will be automatically created for each employee so they can log in and view their dashboard. ), }, { label: 'Step 2: Run Predictions', icon: , content: ( Use AI to predict employee attrition risk and performance. Two Ways to Predict: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Run predictions regularly (weekly recommended) to keep data fresh and spot trends early. ), }, { label: 'Step 3: Understand Results', icon: , content: ( Learn what the predictions mean and how to take action. High Risk (60-100%) Employee is likely to leave. Take immediate action within 1 week. ‚Ä¢ Schedule 1-on-1 meeting ‚Ä¢ Discuss concerns and career goals ‚Ä¢ Consider salary increase or promotion Medium Risk (30-60%) Monitor closely. Check in within 1 month. ‚Ä¢ Regular check-ins ‚Ä¢ Provide career development opportunities Low Risk (0-30%) Employee is satisfied. Continue current approach. ‚Ä¢ Quarterly reviews ‚Ä¢ Maintain engagement ), }, { label: 'Step 4: View Analytics', icon: , content: ( Access detailed insights and trends in the Analytics dashboard. Available Analytics: ‚úÖ Best Practice: Review analytics monthly to identify trends and make data-driven decisions. ), }, ]; const handleNext = () => { setActiveStep((prevActiveStep) => prevActiveStep + 1); }; const handleBack = () => { setActiveStep((prevActiveStep) => prevActiveStep - 1); }; const handleFinish = () => { localStorage.setItem('tutorial_completed', 'true'); onClose(); }; return ( {}} maxWidth="md" fullWidth PaperProps={{ sx: { borderRadius: 3, boxShadow: '0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)', }, }} > Quick Start Guide {activeStep === steps.length - 1 && ( )} {steps.map((step, index) => ( ( = index ? 'primary.main' : 'grey.300', color: 'white', }} > {step.icon} )} > {step.label} {step.content} ))} {activeStep === steps.length - 1 ? ( ) : ( )} ); }; export default WelcomeTutorial;
